qual:
((((user_type)::text = 'worker'::text) AND (user_id IN ( SELECT workers.id
   FROM workers
  WHERE (workers.profile_id = ( SELECT auth.uid() AS uid))))) OR (((user_type)::text = 'employer'::text) AND (user_id IN ( SELECT employers.id
   FROM employers
  WHERE (employers.profile_id = ( SELECT auth.uid() AS uid))))) OR (((user_type)::text = 'accountant'::text) AND (user_id IN ( SELECT accountants.id
   FROM accountants
  WHERE (accountants.profile_id = ( SELECT auth.uid() AS uid))))))
